com.blogspot.technicalmiracle

Class ArbitraryAnimationFragment.DrawView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.blogspot.technicalmiracle.ArbitraryAnimationFragment.DrawView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback
    Enclosing class:
    ArbitraryAnimationFragment

    class ArbitraryAnimationFragment.DrawView
extends android.view.View
    The custom animated 'View' class based on Canvas. This class extends the Android View class using it's onDraw function to generate dynamical changing background. The background make up by the random generated shapes. The background refresh every 66 ms. Each frame of background's animation create as the follower of the previous and include the most of the previous shapes with changed geometrical dimensions.

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Overrides:
        onDraw in class android.view.View
        Parameters:
        canvas - A Background redraw. The set of circles on Portrait Mode or the set of rectangles on Landscape Mode.

      • changeFigures

        private void changeFigures()
        Shapes calculators will execute on thread pool after the application layout redraw.

      • changeFigure

        private void changeFigure(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - index which will add to the array of figure indexes to replace By the the same 'i' index saved both of shapes - the rectangle and the circle. The first signature of the changeFigure function intend to create an array of indexes to replace.

      • changeFigure

        private void changeFigure(int i,
                          int rd)
        Parameters:
        i - an index of 'figures' array rectangle to change The second signature of the changeFigure function intend to change the radius of the circle.

      • changeFigure

                          float r,
                          float l,
                          float t,
                          float b)
        Parameters:
        i - an index of 'figures' array rectangle to change The third signature of the changeFigure function intend to change the rectangle dimensions.

      • replaceFigure

        private void replaceFigure(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - index of shape to replace A shape replace with new one.
